comments:
Exception was caught when the following was performed to view the Virtual Disks:
1. Discover & Probe a SVC.
2. Select 'Disk Manager/Storage Subsystems'
3. Click on 'Virtual Disks'

The console window will show the following exception :

Exception in thread "AWT-EventQueue-0" java.lang.RuntimeException: Operation requires table model to be set first
	at org.eclipse.aperi.gui.tables.MegaTable.assertTableIsBuilt(MegaTable.java:1913)

	at javax.swing.AbstractButton.fireActionPerformed(Unknown Source)

Added try/catch block around assertTableIsBuilt() method in MegaTable and change code to return correct value if an exception is caught and in such case the table has not been built yet.

traces.message: Operation requires table model to be set first
